quotes.text: Love is not about how much you say 'I love you', but how much you prove that it's true.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: I don't need a perfect person, I need someone who makes me feel perfect.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I am who I am, and I don't need to prove anything to anyone.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: My attitude is based on how you treat me.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not perfect, but I'm limited edition.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dil ki baat labon tak aayi, Shayari ban kar rah gayi.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Mohabbat ek aisi kitaab hai, Jise padh kar dil ko sukoon milta hai.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Zindagi mein kuch pal aise aate hain, Jo hamesha yaad rahte hain.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: May this festival bring joy, happiness, and prosperity to your life. Happy Diwali!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wishing you a year filled with happiness, success, and new opportunities. Happy New Year!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: May the colors of Holi fill your life with happiness and joy. Happy Holi!
quotes.author: Unknown
